BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.VectorZ.vmap
BlackBox.template:
~SYM_generate : for ~SYM in (~RESULT'length - 1) downto 0 generate
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM)~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[1](~SYM)~
  ~INST
end generate;

BlackBox.name: CLaSH.Sized.VectorZ.vzipWith
BlackBox.template:
~SYM_generate : for ~SYM in (~RESULT'length - 1) downto 0 generate
begin
  ~INST 0
    ~OUTPUT <= ~RESULT(~SYM)~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[1](~SYM)~
    ~INPUT  <= ~ARG[2](~SYM)~
  ~INST
end generate;
